references: Related: CF 208880, CF 208894, CF 208895. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 15, Block 12, Capitol Hill Division No. 3; Lot 5 and south 10 feet of Lot 6, Block 1, White's Addition; and Lot 6, Block 1, Byron Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-285 and 17-231, respectively.
